title: Enhancing 6G Network Security and Incident Response through Integrated VNF and SDN Technologies
summary: Low-speed internet can negatively affect incident response in a number of ways, including decreased teamwork, delayed detection, inefficient action, and elevated risk. Delayed data acquisition and processing may result from inadequate internet connectivity, hindering security teams' ability to obtain the necessary information for timely and effective responses. Each of these factors may augment the organization's susceptibility to security incidents and their subsequent ramifications. This artic...
